name: Lazy Galaxy
description: Lazy Galaxy is a mix between RTS and idle/clicker game. Lead an evil (albeit lazy) alien race to conquer the universe!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: shader 3.0 supporting card (i.e. Intel HD Graphics 4000) DirectX: Version 9.0a Storage: 512 MB available space Additional Notes: DX9 (shader model 3.0) support
